{{codepointer|Doom|Monster AI}}'''A_BabyMetal''' {{doomwiki|A_BabyMetal}}
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "baby/walk" and calls [[A_Chase]].
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:Arachnotron|Arachnotron]]
See: BSPI A 20 BSPI A 3 [[A_BabyMetal]] BSPI ABBCC 3 [[A_Chase]] BSPI D 3 [[A_BabyMetal]] BSPI DEEFF 3 [[A_Chase]] goto See+1
